name: SF Twitguzeli (PhpBB Gunguzeli Theme Style)
description:
I prepare this userstyle for my favorite forum which uses Gunguzeli theme by default. As you see, it is not a unique theme style. It looks like twitter, so I'm working for it. If you like to use for your phpbb forum, you have to change the domain of "@-moz-document domain()" line. 
Thanks

ps. This userstyle still under development.
